Start: ^I am woken up by an all too familar knock.
^I let out a small resigned sigh, as I get out of bed and answer the door.
^but when I open the door, Max is alone.
^Max stares at me like I'm a weirdo.
Ready: ^There, you see some of your friends all hanging out.
CharlotteEnd: ^I talk to Charlotte. One of three basic conversations occur.
^first, if you told Charlotte what your favorite kind of book you like, she will give one to you.

Polite: ^Charoltte is the same as ever, and you didn't really get close to her.
Friendly: ^Charoltte and you are friendly, but Charlotte is staying here.
Leaving: ^Charoltte informs you that she is leaving too.

EduardoEnd: ^I talk to Eduardo. he has 2 basic states, based on if Isaac broke up with him.

BrokeUp: ^Eduardo is basically super depressed that Isaac broke up with him.
Patches: ^he is kinda down because of the talk they had the other day, but happy that you helped him.
^Additionally, Isaac may come over, having opened up to you.
^also, if you had told Eduardo Isaac's secret, it gets revealed here.
Psychic: ^helped eduardo, but didn't get Isaac to open up. Isaac comes over, and is suprised you knew so much about him.

TrissaEnd: ^I chat with Trissa. small variations, based on Charlotte's state.
^She's basiaclly always the same. her life is going fine, and you have little control over it to screw it up.
^she does have more to say about Charlotte if you told Trissa she was jealous of her.
^in she will also have some varience to if charlotte is leaving or not.
^regardless, you too say your goodbyes, and walk away.
IsaacEnd: ^I chat with Isaac. Mostly, this is based on if you got him to open up with you.

StoneWall: ^I didn't get Isaac to open up, and they broke up.
Outcome: ^Isaac opened up to you, but they still broke up.
Thanks: ^Isaac opened up and the relationship survived.

OutsideWorld: ^You head outside, and begin putting the bags into the car.
^Max asks you some things about what your plans are after this.
